rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0001
rows.name: So? Have you gotten a little used to BLADE work yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0010
rows.name: Show composure

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0011
rows.name: Cross arms confidently

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0020
rows.name: Show Anxiety

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look troubled and shake head

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0002
rows.name: Impressive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Now I get why Elma-san and Commander Vandham
said you had potential.[ST:wait ]\

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0004
rows.name:
But arrogance is forbidden for BLADE.
Let's review just in case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0005
rows.name: A lot has happened, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Right. Okay.
Let's do a review right here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Our biggest mission as BLADE is
the search for the Life Points.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0008
rows.name: Got that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
In the lost Life,
countless people are still sleeping.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Until now, we were concerned that the Life
would be destroyed by native creatures, but...[ST:wait

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0011
rows.name:
The appearance of intelligent life forms hostile to humanity,
confirmed on this mission,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0012
rows.name: becomes a threat greater than that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0013
rows.name:
That's why we have to find the Life
as quickly as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0014
rows.name:
The fastest way to do that
is expanding FrontierNet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0015
rows.name:
And for that expansion, what's needed
is installing Data Probes that can survey a wide area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0016
rows.name:
In other words, what you, as a BLADE member, must prioritize
is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0017
rows.name:
traveling around Mira, installing Data Probes,
and expanding Frontier Net.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0018
rows.name: Understand so far?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0030
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod, indicating it's fine.

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0040
rows.name: Look Confused

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0041
rows.name: Grimace and tilt head confusedly

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Okay then, I'll explain
BLADE's other mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0020
rows.name: Okay then, I'll explain it again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0021
rows.name:
BLADE's other mission.
It's for humanity's survival[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0022
rows.name: to subjugate native creatures that become threats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0023
rows.name: We who crash-landed on Mira[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0024
rows.name:
must prepare ourselves
to live here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0025
rows.name:
But there are too many dangers for that.
So much that living in peace is far off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0026
rows.name:
Eliminating native creatures for our own convenience
is painful to the heart, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0027
rows.name:
to ensure the human species doesn't die out,
it can't be helped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0028
rows.name:
But it's not like we subjugate
all native creatures![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0029
rows.name: Strictly speaking, BLADE HQ[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0030
rows.name: only eliminate indigenous lifeforms that pose a threat to humanity's survival.

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0031
rows.name:
In order to contribute to this cause, operatives are asked
to form into squads to take on special missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0032
rows.name:
That's because this type of mission,
unlike ones accepted from the regular Quest Board,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0033
rows.name:
is issued directly from BLADE HQ
to all members.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0034
rows.name:
We call these special missions
BLADE Quests.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0035
rows.name:
A Squad is something like a unit
formed with a maximum of 32 people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0036
rows.name:
That's because it's a mission that can't possibly be done
by just one or two people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0037
rows.name: It's quite unusual for an order to be issued to all squad members like this.

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0038
rows.name: So, from now on, first[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0039
rows.name:
you'll definitely have to select a Squad to join,
so be ready for that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0040
rows.name: And one more thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0041
rows.name: Squad Missions are not mandatory.

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0042
rows.name:
That's because some members might be undertaking
regular missions with higher priority.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0043
rows.name: The reason all team members are involved is because they anticipated this kind of situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0044
rows.name: That covers the general review and explanation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0045
rows.name: Search for the missing pieces of the Life Point...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0045_2
rows.name: Install data probes to expand FrontierNet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0046
rows.name: and take on BLADE Quests when you can to keep us safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0047
rows.name: Understood?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0050
rows.name: Perfectly

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod strongly indication there's no problem.

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0060
rows.name: Look Confused

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0061
rows.name: Gaze into distance

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0048
rows.name: I have high expectations for your skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0049
rows.name: Let's both do our best![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0050
rows.name: Since it's important, I'll go over it as many times as it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0051
rows.name: All right, well, it's getting pretty late, so let's let's call it a night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0052
rows.name: Yeah, let's do that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0053
rows.name: It's been so long, I get to sleep in a fluffy bed, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0054
rows.name: Lin-san, where is Tatsu's room, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0055
rows.name: Your room is right over there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0056
rows.name:
A cool room, just like Tatsu, meh!
[ST:wide ]― Wait, no, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0057
rows.name: Tatsu knows, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0058
rows.name:
That's the box called a refrigerator
for chilling food, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0059
rows.name: Huh~ Nopon people are clever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0060
rows.name: Aww~ That's not true, meh~[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0061
rows.name:
―Not that!
Tatsu is not food, meh~~~![ST:wait ]
